description: This guy was so scared that his girlfriend might find out about his screw up that he insisted on meeting anywhere except their home. And he had a pretty good reason to be scared. He was supposed to pay for a vacation they both planned for a long time. Our clever boy got an idea how to improve their budget by gambling. Obviously, he lost all the money and now needed my help. He was really desperate. I´m sure his girlfriend would kill him. It made my situation a lot easier. The boy worked as a car mechanic but still couldn´t repay the loan I offered him in time. So I gave him another option. He would become my sex toy and I would pay for his vacation in Turkey. He agreed and I can only hope that his girlfriend wasn´t asking question about our secret meeting.
title: Debt Dandy 256
